questions.text: What is the process where water changes from liquid to vapor?
questions.explanation: Evaporation is the process where water changes from liquid to gas/vapor due to heat.

questions.text: Which of these is a non-living thing?
questions.explanation: A rock is non-living matter. Plants, animals, and bacteria are all living organisms.

questions.text: What do plants use to make their own food?
questions.explanation: Plants use photosynthesis: water + CO2 + sunlight = glucose + oxygen

title: English Second Language - Reading & Usage Sample A
subject: English

questions.text: The teacher _____ us an interesting story yesterday.
questions.explanation: Past tense is needed for 'yesterday'. Simple past tense uses 'told'.
Sad is the opposite of happy. Both describe emotions.

options: The process by which plants make food using sunlight
The process by which animals digest food
The process by which water evaporates
The process by which rocks break down
questions.answer: The process by which plants make food using sunlight
questions.explanation: Photosynthesis is how plants convert sunlight into chemical energy (food).

questions.text: Write a short paragraph (5-7 sentences) about your favorite hobby.
questions.sampleAnswer: Sample: My favorite hobby is reading. I enjoy reading adventure books and mystery novels. Reading helps me learn new words and ideas. I usually read before bed at night. It relaxes me and helps me sleep better. I have read many interesting books this year.
questions.explanation:
Good writing uses complete sentences, proper grammar, and describes the hobby clearly. 

üìù Sample Answer:
My favorite hobby is reading. I enjoy reading adventure books and mystery novels. Reading helps me learn new words and ideas. I usually read before bed at night. It relaxes me and helps me sleep better. I have read many interesting books this year.
